SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT act.act_no, act.act_title, act.act_date, act.act_trm, act.rep, act.bnp, count(bid_price) as bid_count, NVL(MAX(bid_price), 0) AS bid_price FROM auction act LEFT JOIN auction_apply apl ON (act.act_no = apl.act_no) WHERE act.reg_stts = 'e1'
AND act.act_Date <= sysdate
GROUP BY act.act_no, act.act_title, act.act_date, act.act_trm, act.rep, act.bnp
ORDER BY act_no DESC
ORDER BY bid_count DESC
ORDER BY bid_price
ORDER BY bid_price DESC
) a
WHERE rownum <= #{page} * 9) b WHERE b.rn > (#{page}-1) * 9

SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT act.act_no, act.act_title, act.act_date, act.act_trm, act.rep, act.bnp, count(bid_price) as bid_count, NVL(MAX(bid_price), 0) AS bid_price FROM auction act LEFT JOIN auction_apply apl ON (act.act_no = apl.act_no) WHERE act.reg_stts = 'e1' GROUP BY act.act_no, act.act_title, act.act_date, act.act_trm, act.rep, act.bnp )
SELECT * FROM auction_apply WHERE bid_price = ( SELECT MAX(bid_price) FROM auction_apply WEHRE act_no = #{actNo} )
